title: STILL Having Packet Loss
body:
I have insane packet loss spikes in game. I have NO Ping loss or FPS drop, my game just freezes for a bit. I've done a test for packet loss. Which resulted in:
|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

|                                      WinMTR statistics                                   |

|                       Host              -   %  | Sent | Recv | Best | Avrg | Wrst | Last |

|------------------------------------------------|------|------|------|------|------|------|

|                             192.168.0.1 -    1 | 3550 | 3548 |    1 |    1 |   73 |    1 |

|                            96.120.4.125 -    1 | 3554 | 3553 |    4 |   10 |  126 |    9 |

|xe-9-2-0-sur01.y3canton.ga.atlanta.comcast.net -    1 | 3550 | 3548 |    4 |   13 |  107 |    9 |

|xe-8-0-21-0-ar01.b0atlanta.ga.atlanta.comcast.net -    1 | 3460 | 3435 |    6 |   12 |   61 |   12 |

|hu-0-4-0-0-cr02.56marietta.ga.ibone.comcast.net -    1 | 3539 | 3534 |    7 |   14 |   76 |   14 |

|hu-0-11-0-0-pe04.56marietta.ga.ibone.comcast.net -    1 | 3542 | 3538 |    8 |   13 |   85 |   12 |

|               as7922.eqdltx.seabone.net -    1 | 3554 | 3553 |    6 |   12 |   79 |   12 |

|                          104.160.135.35 -    1 | 3554 | 3553 |   22 |   29 |  108 |   28 |

|          ae32-br02.chi01.riotdirect.net -    1 | 3538 | 3533 |   23 |   28 |   91 |   28 |

|           ae1-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net -    1 | 3554 | 3553 |   23 |   28 |   91 |   28 |

|                           104.160.131.1 -    1 | 3542 | 3538 |   23 |   29 |  105 |   28 |

|________________________________________________|______|______|______|______|______|______|

   WinMTR v0.92 GPL V2 by Appnor MSP - Fully Managed Hosting & Cloud Provider



I ran it for like a 45 minutes in a game so that's maybe why the numbers are so big. If someone spots an issue that'd be great. 

Once again, It's ONLY in this game, and my FPS and Ping DO NOT drop at all. Pleaseeee help me. It makes the game nearly unplayable at points. 

Thanks c:

replies.body:
The results you posted don't really indicate any packet loss.  I'd recommend submitting some of your logs through our [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) which can analyze your network logs from League and give a better idea of whether or not it's packet loss, ping instability, etc.

Should give us a better idea of what's going on and when.  The log reader's pretty new for us, so let me know what you think!

Packet loss is when your game skips around without any ping lag or frame lag, right? 

That happens to me ALL THE TIME during the first 30 seconds of the game. As I walk, I just keep jumping around the screen, but it's usually over by the end of the first minute. It's been this way for a few years now.
